title: Can't post/comment: "Must be level 6 or higher to post a comment"!
body:
Greetings,

Why am I receiving that error when trying to reply in most boards? {{item:3070}} 

Thanks,
~ Yasuo main

replies.body: Sometimes profiles need to sync with the boards, especially if they are posting for the first time.   This may require a post or something as simple as an upvote to update.  I'm glad everything is working for you now!
i have the same problem..I'm not sure it was solved or not by now...seems that i can reply here..{{item:3070}}
